item.title: 谷歌Gemini能主动分析用户的Gmail、照片和搜索记录
item.description: 谷歌母公司Alphabet宣布，其Gemini人工智能助手现可主动调用用户在Gmail、搜索、照片和YouTube等服务中的数据，旨在提升面向消费者的AI产品个性化体验。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google said its Gemini artificial intelligence assistant can now proactively tap into users’ data across Gmail, Search, Photos and YouTube, an attempt to make its consumer-facing AI product more personalized.】

item.title: 台积电股价飙升迫使交易员另寻股票押注新途径
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司股价的飙升行情令投资者陷入进退维谷的境地，因多头仓位过于拥挤，使得多空双方都难以对该股进行新的押注。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s blistering rally has left investors boxed in, as crowded long positions make it difficult for both bulls and bears to place fresh bets on the stock.】

item.title: 特斯拉在印度遭遇挫折，未售出的Model Y SUV车型开始打折促销
item.description: 知情人士透露，特斯拉公司正努力处理去年进口到印度的首批车辆中约三分之一，因为部分早前预订的潜在买家已退出交易。【原文：Tesla Inc. is struggling to offload about a third of the initial vehicles it imported to India last year, as some prospective buyers who made early bookings have backed out, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 直觉外科股价下跌，因竞争对手放缓旗舰机器人业务
item.description: 直觉外科公司股价创下9月以来最大跌幅，此前这家外科机器人制造商预测，随着竞争对手推出新产品，其旗舰外科机器人系统今年的使用量增长将放缓。【原文：Intuitive Surgical Inc. shares fell the most since September after the surgical robot maker forecast slower growth for use of its flagship surgical robotic system system this year as rivals bring new products to market.】

item.title: 油轮保险费飙升预示黑海局势日益动荡
item.description: 穿越黑海的船舶保险成本再度飙升，不断升级的袭击事件凸显了该地区运输商品风险日益加剧。【原文：The cost of insuring ships sailing through the Black Sea is surging again, as spiraling attacks on vessels underscore the growing risk of hauling commodities through the region.】

item.title: 劳动力短缺或阻碍电厂建设，奥克洛首席执行官表示
item.description: 核能企业奥克洛公司警告称，技术工人短缺正威胁成为新建核电站进程中的瓶颈。【原文：Nuclear company Oklo Inc. is warning that shortages of skilled workers are threatening to become a bottleneck in efforts to build new power plants.】

item.title: 币安现货加密货币交易市场份额跌至2021年初以来最低点
item.description: 随着竞争对手抢占市场份额，以及交易者转向新的数字资产买卖方式，币安在全球加密货币交易领域的掌控力正在减弱。【原文：Binance’s grip on global crypto trading is weakening as rivals pick up market share and traders shift to new ways of buying and selling digital assets.】

item.title: 英国政府借贷成本降至2024年12月以来最低水平
item.description: 英国基准债券价格上涨，收益率降至2024年12月以来最低水平，此前债券发售需求强劲且经济增长放缓迹象显现。【原文：The UK’s benchmark bonds rallied to send yields to the lowest since December 2024, following healthy demand for a debt sale and signs of slowing economic growth.】

item.title: 英国男子因涉嫌黑客交易计划面临美国引渡
item.description: 一名英国公民因涉嫌经营"黑客交易"计划，在伦敦败诉后面临被引渡至美国的命运。【原文：A British national, accused of running a “hack-to-trade” scheme, is facing extradition to the US after losing a legal challenge in London.】

item.title: 美联储的米兰在主张降息的论据中加入了放松监管的论点
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬·米兰表示，特朗普政府的放松监管议程为央行继续降息提供了额外理由。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said the Trump administration’s deregulatory agenda offers the central bank an additional reason to continue lowering interest rates.】

item.title: Virtu与Optiver据称联手对抗Citadel Securities在美国期权交易流领域的竞争
item.description: 四家做市商联手支持一家从零售经纪商处收购美国期权订单流的公司，此举撼动了为股票市场快速增长领域提供流动性的高利润业务。【原文：Four market making firms have joined forces to back a firm buying US options order flow from retail brokers, shaking up the lucrative business of providing liquidity to a fast-growing corner of the equity market.】

item.title: 凯雷集团考虑收购本·戴尔旗下联邦液化天然气公司股权
item.description: 知情人士透露，私募股权公司凯雷集团正考虑投资本·戴尔旗下金梅里奇能源管理公司持有的联邦液化天然气公司。【原文：Private equity firm Carlyle Group Inc. is considering investing in Commonwealth LNG, owned by Ben Dell’s Kimmeridge Energy Management Co., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 最高法院周三未就特朗普关税案作出裁决
item.description: 美国最高法院周三未就针对特朗普总统关税政策的挑战作出裁决，全球至少要等到下周才能知晓这项标志性经济政策的命运。【原文：The US Supreme Court didn’t rule on challenges to President Donald Trump’s tariffs Wednesday, leaving the world to wait until at least next week to learn the fate of his signature economic policy.】

item.title: 汇丰银行称智能眼镜市场到2040年将达2000亿美元规模
item.description: 汇丰控股分析师表示，智能眼镜市场的快速增长势头将进一步加速，这将为主要受益者依视路陆逊梯卡公司带来提振。【原文：The rapid growth of the market for smart glasses is set to accelerate further, providing a boost for prime beneficiary EssilorLuxottica SA, HSBC Holdings Plc analysts said.】

item.title: 美国二手房销售量攀升至2023年以来最强劲水平
item.description: 美国12月成屋销售量攀升至2023年以来最快增速，这对持续低迷数年的房地产市场而言是个积极信号。【原文：US previously owned home sales climbed in December to the fastest pace since 2023, a welcome sign for a housing market that has lacked momentum for several years.】

item.title: 破产的萨克斯百货欠香奈儿、开云集团和路威酩轩集团约2.25亿美元
item.description: 萨克斯全球企业集团拖欠奢侈品牌货款的行为，在加速该零售商衰落并最终导致其破产的过程中起到了关键作用。【原文：Saks Global Enterprises’ delayed payments to luxury brands played a key role in accelerating the retailer’s decline and pushing it into bankruptcy.】

item.title: 美国股市延续跌势，因数据未能令人信服地证明降息路径
item.description: 周三美国股市延续跌势，因一系列经济数据未能改变市场对美联储加息路径的预期，交易员们也在消化最新一轮大型银行财报。【原文：A slide in US stocks continued Wednesday as a flurry of economic data failed to change any expectations for the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate path and traders digest the latest round of big bank earnings.】

item.title: 美联储的保尔森重申，她预计2026年下半年将出现小幅降息。
item.description: 费城联邦储备银行行长安娜·保尔森重申，在最新通胀数据印证其谨慎乐观预期后，她认为今年晚些时候仍有进一步降息的空间。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia President Anna Paulson repeated she sees room for further interest-rate cuts later this year after the latest inflation data confirmed her cautious optimism.】

item.title: 霍洛吉克公司85亿美元杠杆收购贷款成本因强劲需求而收紧
item.description: 多家银行大幅削减了85亿美元杠杆贷款的定价，以资助医疗设备制造商Hologic公司的收购交易，这凸显了投资者对风险资产的强烈需求。【原文：A group of banks has slashed the pricing on $8.5 billion of leveraged loans to help fund the buyout of medical-device maker Hologic Inc., underscoring strong investor appetite for risk.】

item.title: 德桑蒂斯警告人工智能与数据中心的"真实危险"，并推动监管
item.description: 佛罗里达州州长罗恩·德桑蒂斯正加大力度开展一场针对人工智能和数据中心潜在风险的运动，抵制唐纳德·特朗普总统阻止各州干预科技巨头的努力。【原文：Florida Governor Ron DeSantis is ratcheting up a campaign against the potential dangers of artificial intelligence and data centers, resisting President Donald Trump’s effort to block states from meddling with Big Tech.】

item.title: 花旗集团计划在Banamex首次公开募股前出售更多股份
item.description: 花旗集团正考虑出售旗下墨西哥零售银行部门Banamex金融集团更多股权，同时拒绝承诺今年重新启动该公司的公开上市计划。【原文：Citigroup Inc. is eyeing the possibility of selling more stakes in its Mexican retail-banking unit, Grupo Financiero Banamex, while declining to recommit to a public listing this year.】

item.title: 美联储官员古尔斯比称央行独立性是低通胀关键
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦·古尔斯比为央行独立性辩护，认为这是实现低廉且稳定物价的必要条件。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee defended central bank independence, arguing it’s necessary for achieving low and stable prices.】

item.title: 德国财长敦促欧洲在特朗普时代增强韧性
item.description: 德国财政部长拉尔斯·克林贝尔敦促欧洲各国采取强硬立场，以成功应对当前全球动荡时期，避免沦为"大国的棋子"。【原文：German Finance Minister Lars Klingbeil urged European nations to get tough if they’re to successfully negotiate the current period of global upheaval and avoid becoming “pawns of the major powers.”】

item.title: 恩维鲁斯称委内瑞拉未来十年石油产量将激增50%
item.description: 据行业咨询机构Enverus预测，随着美国捕获长期执政的尼古拉斯·马杜罗，委内瑞拉重返全球石油市场后，未来十年该国原油产量预计将增长约50%。【原文：Venezuela’s return to growth in the global oil market following the US capture of long-time leader Nicolas Maduro is forecast to boost crude output by roughly 50% over the coming decade, according to industry consultant Enverus.】

item.title: 恩智浦指控中国母公司威胁 芯片纠纷激化
item.description: 荷兰芯片制造商恩智浦公司（Nexperia BV）在一次激烈法庭听证会上指控，其中国控股方永达科技（Wingtech Technology Co.）正强行要求将技术转移出欧洲，并威胁公司高管。这场听证会揭示了这场控制权之争已演变为多么深刻且充满个人恩怨的纠纷。【原文：Dutch chipmaker Nexperia BV claimed that Chinese owner Wingtech Technology Co. was pushing for technology transfers out of Europe and threatening executives in a highly charged court hearing that laid bare how deep and personal a dispute over control has become.】

item.title: 贝森特批评韩元贬值，此前曾就日元发表言论
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特·贝森特周三对韩元过度贬值提出警告，在该货币滑向2009年以来最低点之际，罕见地对其作出口头支持。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent called out excessive declines in South Korea’s won on Wednesday, offering rare verbal support to the currency as it slides toward its weakest since 2009.】

item.title: 安哥拉实施2023年以来最大降息幅度，通胀压力缓解
item.description: 安哥拉央行实施了近三年来最大幅度的降息，因预期通胀率将继续放缓。【原文：Angola’s central bank delivered its biggest interest-rate cut in nearly three years on expectations that inflation will continue to slow.】

item.title: 欧洲油市走强，哈萨克斯坦原油供应趋紧
item.description: 欧洲石油市场正大幅走强——逆全球供应过剩趋势而动——因哈萨克斯坦等地运量减少导致供应趋紧。【原文：The oil market in Europe is strengthening sharply — bucking a global surplus — as reduced shipments from Kazakhstan and elsewhere tighten supply.】

item.title: 德夫林押注特朗普败诉，赌美国国债收益率曲线陡峭化
item.description: 前太平洋投资管理公司高管埃德·德夫林正加码押注收益率曲线陡峭化将获利的交易，他认为若特朗普政府在关税案中败诉，美国将被迫增加借贷。【原文：Former Pimco executive Ed Devlin has been adding to trades that will pay off if the yield curve steepens, believing the US will be forced to increase borrowing if the Trump administration loses the Supreme Court case on tariffs.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡里称特朗普施压关乎货币政策：《纽约时报》
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔·卡什卡利表示，过去一年唐纳德·特朗普总统对美国央行的施压主要源于利率问题。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari said President Donald Trump’s pressure on the US central bank over the past year has been driven by interest rates.】
